website_summaries.verdict: Users can choose either APS-C or Full-Frame sensor-cleaning swabs, earning this kit a spot on our list.
pros: Most DSLR camera cleaning kits include swabs for cleaning APS-C sensors
More serious photographers may have cameras with FFR sensors, too, and this kit has swabs for both
Included cleaning solution is natural and water-based to prevent streaks or smudges
Swabs are made in dust-free environment to avoid leaving particles on sensors
Soft swab heads won't scratch sensors
cons: Doesn't include materials  for lens cleaning

customer_reviews.title: I was shocked how well this worked
customer_reviews.text: I've cleaned (tried) my sensors before and the results were, well, dismal. My sensors were so dirty that my photos looked like it was snowing evil black snow. So I tried these swabs. Three cameras later, two showed less than four small spots each and the third was squeaky clean. I was totally amazed. Very easy to use. Comes with cleaning solution and swabs and directions. These are for APS-C sensors. Should not be used on full frame sensors. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice to clean out sensor and is very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Work really well. Used it twice to clean out sensor and is very satisfied with this product. I own a Nikon D5500 and I used it lot out in field and do noticed that my sensor do get dirty pretty often and decided to give this product a try. Was happy that I did. I did compared this to in store and the difference is in price. Store tend to sell this for 50-60 dollars while here I can order in bulk for same price. I do understand the importance of supporting box stores however you can't argue with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Xgamil Campos

customer_reviews.title: No more editing out the dust on macro photos
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for cleaning the sensor on my Nikon Z6. I use a 2:1 ultra macro lens and when you're at 2:1, anything on the sensor shows up dramatically. My sensor is much cleaner now, so I won't have to edit out the dust on my macro photos.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Moon

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and send your SLR in to a factory authorized service center for cleaning. The full size cleaners I tried to use on my Nikon D700 were too wide to fit. But I tried anyway and ended up with more debris than before I started. I hope I didn't damage anything expensive. Sometimes there is just no substitute for experience. This is one of those times.
customer_reviews.author: George B

customer_reviews.title: No lint and cleans with one swipe
customer_reviews.text: These sensor swabs worked great, the material was very soft and didn't leave residue like some of the more paper type swabs. The price was great especially for how many you get and for how well they work. I paid double that for the cheap paper type and they were terrible. I've bought this twice now and will buy more as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Darrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, enough to last a year or so
customer_reviews.text: These are similar if not the same as the VSGO brand. I wouldn't be surprised if they were made in the same factory. They work well, not sure if they are identical materials or quality control but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: silverboi

customer_reviews.title: Great and saves you money .
customer_reviews.text: Product works perfectly . Please read instructions and watch videos before doing a clean on your sensor . This product will save you money from taking your camera in and having it cleaned .
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my Nikon D5500 sensor when the blower initially failed to get a couple of spots. Dried application and use two swaps. Didn't use the liquid for the sensor. I did use the solution it to clean the front of my 35mm 1.8g lens though using the same swab. Cleaned it rather well. And I also used the same two swabs to clean a lot of spots on my LCD screen. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: K. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my needs. I followed the directions and ended up with a clean sensor on my Sony NEX-3n in one shot; I wasn't expecting that and I ended up very pleasantly surprised. The solution dropper bottle didn't have a dripper cap, instead requiring me to poke my own hole in the inner cap. I removed one star for that, which I will agree is a nitpick. I'm glad I have this kit on hand. (Edit: the company updated the photos to show the dropped end. Good update and on them for responding.)
customer_reviews.author: Ted Kniazewycz

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job quick and easy, just need to take care and press very lightly, slightly more than the weight of the swap itself.
customer_reviews.author: Beneath His Wings

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third set. I think it does just what it should for a good price. This is good enough to clean my camera twice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kunzman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - arrived as predicted - used them dry & they worked great! I did use a little cleaning fluid on the wipe for one of my cameras that had a stubborn fleck of 'dirt on the sensor - took it off straight away but left smeary - had to use Johnson cotton buds to clear up the smeary sensor then used a new dry wipe to finish off..........great product
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This really works. You need to watch some YouTube videos, to get the hang of this. But super easy to use, if you have a bit of dexterity. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about using something like this but it actually worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Worked as expected!  Great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect price! Local camera shop wanted $53 for swaps and solution!! It took me 15 seconds to clean it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!  Easy to use as long as you follow the instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Already used this product to successfully clean sensors on 5 different Fujifilm mirrorless cameras. I will definitely be buying more now that some friends have asked me to clean their sensors.
customer_reviews.author: LFV

customer_reviews.title: My best friend.
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if it works, but it seems to have cleaned the dust off of my better half... (My DSLR...)
customer_reviews.author: Weston Ney Photo Video

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts rendered the kit useless
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with swabs and cleaning fluid but the cleaning fluid was missing the dropper tip thus rendering the kit useless! I suspect it was just a quality control issue but I'm stuck with a kit that I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Received the kit in a timely manner, 2 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the kit in a timely manner, 2 days, and used it immediately. I followed the directions provided and was able to clean the sensor effectively. Had to use two swabs because the width of the swab did not cover the width of the sensor entirely. I believe that with a wider swab, I could had done the cleaning using just one swab. Replacement swabs are not cheap, so a wider swab makes more economic sense for the customer, and limits the time the sensor and the overall camera interior is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell R. Colberg

customer_reviews.title: It can be a little intimidating to DIY on the sensor but this was really easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Sports on my crop sensor not removed with blower. This was a well explained, excellently packaged, easy to use product which fixed the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I will buy it again and have not problem recommending to friends.
customer_reviews.author: richpics

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast service.
customer_reviews.text: Came in one day. Easy to use but you can watch videos on YouTube for your particular DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Zoomie

customer_reviews.title: Fine swabs, no liquid control.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions state to use two drops of liquid on the swab which is very similar to other solutions available. But there's no way to do that given the type of container the liquid is in. There's no drip tip or anything like that. You simply get oversaturated swabs 100% of the time. Otherwise it seems to be a quality product and I plan to use the swabs with other cleaning solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bergherm

customer_reviews.title: but I strongly recommend you get a loupe so you can see what ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but I strongly recommend you get a loupe so you can see what you're doing and you'll use fewer swabs
customer_reviews.author: Royal Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about if it would leave spots it left nothing but I did finish off with a second dry one.The Sensor is spotless.
customer_reviews.author: David Salverson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: If you own a camera and value it, it's important that it's clean ever so often. This cleaning kit will do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent swabs for cleaning, sticks are longer then expected, and not needed that long. Came quickly in nice pacakge.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my A6500 which collects dust on the sensor quite easily...
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sensor cleaners to use on my Sony A7II. They work fine - but you must remember to be very careful using them or any ot her product when you touch touch the sensor. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: wyart

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are individually wrapped. I used it a cheap, used, Samsung mirrorless camera. The sensor was horrible but these worked great
customer_reviews.author: Stormageddon88

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Except the swabs leave a tad of tiny dust. But the solution is amazing. I messed up my sensor using the other product, and this kit helped me to solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great swabs, company puts a lot into professional presentation and delivering a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, must have for DSLR owner
customer_reviews.text: Saved my dslr camera from dust particles and other spots on my sensor. Now I can shoot pictures again without dark spots ;)
customer_reviews.author: Florian Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you are expecting, 14 individually sealed swabs and a bottle of sensor cleaner. works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: P S

customer_reviews.title: Swab cleaner highly recommend for all users cleaning their camera and lens and surface.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased my second order and love swab cleaners. I highly recommend for all users.
customer_reviews.author: BBaca

customer_reviews.title: Great price, wish I could just purchase the swabs ...
customer_reviews.text: These work very well, although I am preferring to use additional cleaning solutions from another manufacturer over the included bottle. Great price, wish I could just purchase the swabs by the gross.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Foxworthy

customer_reviews.title: Keep cmos clean on older camera
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning cmos, must have for taking exposures with long shutter times.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Harris

customer_reviews.title: Clean sensors
customer_reviews.text: I really was impressed by how perfect this cleaned the sensor of my a6300, wow it is highly recommended. 100% That's why I took the task of leaving this comment.
customer_reviews.author: blackbeetle85

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Work as expected. My sensor is now clean and dust free.
customer_reviews.author: Saggy.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean my sony A7RII, easy and clean
customer_reviews.author: Luo Han

customer_reviews.title: Great result for a low price !
customer_reviews.text: I paid $50 at my local camera shop, using this kit and just two of the swabs and the job was done equally well. Very happy with the result and it was very easy to do and I didn't feel my sensor was in any risk. One recommendation - get the camera sensor magnifier. It makes a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Pycroft

customer_reviews.title: I like the individually wrapped swabs
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I like the individually wrapped swabs. Nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: but I strongly recommend you get a loupe so you can see what ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but I strongly recommend you get a loupe so you can see what you're doing and you'll use fewer swabs

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Took me a couple tries, but works great. No more spots!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Look up how to use this product on ...
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned my canon M6 and my two Sony A6000. Perfect. Look up how to use this product on You Tube with TechnologyMafia he shows you how to do it perfectly on any APC Camera.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My husband used it for his camera and was very pleased with the results. Easy to use and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aro

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Saved my butt on a used camera purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Very good, recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good product and with a good price. I recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Peiovici Slagian

customer_reviews.title: I am truly glad having this sensor cleaner for my camera
customer_reviews.text: I am truly glad having this sensor cleaner for my camera. No worry "dots" on the photo anymore! It's easy to use and wipe the sensor completely cleaned. I am really happy and confident with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These swabs are the best in the fewest amount of passes
customer_reviews.text: I've cleaned a lot of sensors using various products. These swabs are the best in the fewest amount of passes.
customer_reviews.author: Garon Kiesel

customer_reviews.title: Good Products
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 times using 5 swabs. Most of the spots were gone, only a couple of small ones remain at the very corner. I am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: yanqiao li

customer_reviews.title: Keep the swabs, ditch the cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Didn't clean the dust off my camera sensor AND the cleaner left water spots on it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and item is exactly as described my sensor is clean!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is incredibly useful. I hadn't seen another brush like this before
customer_reviews.text: Dont go for another product, this is incredibly useful. I hadn't seen another brush like this before.
customer_reviews.author: Ufuk Serim Arslan

customer_reviews.title: I like how all of them individually rapped
customer_reviews.text: This worked to clean my Sony full frame sensor. I like how all of them individually rapped. I gave 4 star because , price is too high for low cost item like that.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much awful.
customer_reviews.text: These are awful, the swabs streak regardless of how much solvent you put on. I literally had to use 2-3 each pass, 1 with the solvent and 2 to dry. I have used several other types of swabs before and these are by far the worst, I am not sure why the reviews are so good. They caused more harm than good, and I ended up needing to get different ones just fix what these did to my sensor.
customer_reviews.author: JoelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My sensor is clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack for my Sony a7iii. I have been noticing sensor dust in some of my photos. I watched a video tutorial on how to use these swabs and quickly cleaned my sensor. I did a check and the sensor is clean again! I don't know why it took me so long to buy these. Do yourself a favor and clean your own sensor. It's way cheaper and it really isn't' that hard.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Windeknecht

product_meta.title: UES FFR24 Professional DSLR SLR Digital Camera CMOS and CCD Sensor Cleaning Swab Kits for Full-Frame Sensors: 14 X 24mm Full Frame Sensor Cleaning Swabs + 15ml Sensor Cleaner
feature_bullets: Package includes 14pcs 24mm Sensor Cleaning Swabs for Full-Frame Sensors and 15ml Sensor Cleaner
Every sensor cleaning swab is made in a 100% dust-free environment and sealed in a vacuum package
Super soft and flexible swab head spreads pressure evenly across the sensor and cause NO damage
The sensor cleaner is made from ultrapure water, clean sensors without leaving streaks or blemishes
The sensor cleaner is safe for both CCD and CMOS image sensors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars881 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
